Fourier transform infrared spectroscopy.EquipmentUsed: Perkin Elmer Spectrum One FTIR Spectrophotometer

Thermogravimetric analysis.Description: The sample was heated from 30 to 700°C under a 60 ml/min nitrogen flow at a heating rate of 10°C/min.

Xray diffraction and scattering.Description: The X-ray powder diffraction patterns of the synthesized particles were obtained using Cu Kα radiation (λ = 1.5405 Å) and operating at an accelerating voltage of 40 kV, in the 2θ range from 10 to 80° (step of 0.01°).

Refractive index dispersion measurement.EquipmentUsed: Variable angle spectroscopy ellipsometer (VASE, J.A. Woollam Co., Inc. EC-400)
Refractive index dispersion measurement.Description: The refractive index dispersion of the composites was measured by VASE on a spin-coated sample on a Si wafer. The measured results were fitted with the Cauchy model.

Transmittance spectra measurement.Description: Transmittance spectra were obtained using air as the reference. The nanocomposite samples were placed in perpendicular to the incident light to measure the transmittance.

Graft density estimation.Description: Graft density of PGMA chains was estimated based on TGA weight loss due to decomposition of the grafted chains.
